summary: Frontend testing of OMEGA Dashboard P1 Community tile feature. All 13 features tested with 100% success rate. Community tile renders with posts, alerts, polls, reactions, comments, and new post composer. All data is MOCKED via getMockFeed().
critical_code_review_comments: All Community feed data is MOCKED via getMockFeed() - no real API integration
CommunityTile component is well-structured with proper data-testid attributes
PostCard component handles all post types (post, alert, poll) correctly
NewPostComposer supports Post/Alert/Poll type selection with dynamic UI
TileHelpTabs integration provides standardized Help/Troubleshoot/Legend tabs
QuickHelpTips component renders collapsible tips section
test_credentials: None required - all data is mocked
seed_data_creation: Mock data provided by getMockFeed() in CommunityTile.jsx
context_for_next_testing_agent: P1 Community tile fully tested. Key test IDs: community-tile, community-help-btn, new-post-btn, new-post-composer, filter-all, filter-alert, filter-poll, community-feed, post-post-001 (alert), post-post-002 (poll), poll-post-002, poll-option-opt1, poll-option-opt2, comments-post-001, tile-tab-help, tile-tab-troubleshoot, tile-tab-legend

P1.1_community_tile_renders.details: Community tile renders with header showing 'Community' title and Users icon

P1.2_quick_tips_section.details: Quick Tips collapsible section renders below header

P1.3_filter_tabs.details: Filter tabs (All/Alerts/Polls) render and are clickable with data-testid='filter-all', 'filter-alert', 'filter-poll'

P1.4_filter_changes_posts.details: Clicking Alerts filter shows only alert posts, Polls filter shows only poll posts

P1.5_alert_post_badge.details: Alert post (post-001) shows red 'ALERT' badge and red border styling

P1.7_poll_options_percentage.details: Poll options show percentage (67%, 33%, 0%) with progress bar and checkmark on selected vote

P1.8_poll_voting.details: Clicking poll option changes vote and updates percentages dynamically

P1.9_reactions_display.details: Reactions (üëç‚ù§Ô∏èüòÆ) display with counts on posts

P1.10_reaction_picker.details: Clicking smile icon shows reaction picker with emoji options (üëç‚ù§Ô∏èüòÆüò¢üéâ)

P1.11_comments_expand.details: Clicking comment button expands comments section showing existing comments and input field

P1.12_new_post_composer.details: Clicking + button opens new post composer with Post/Alert/Poll type selector

P1.13_poll_composer_options.details: Selecting Poll type in composer shows option inputs (Option 1, Option 2, Add Option)

P1.14_help_button.details: Help button (?) opens Community Help view with standardized TileHelpTabs

P1.15_help_tabs.details: Community Help has Help/Troubleshoot/Legend tabs with proper content

screenshots_taken: 05_alerts_filter.jpeg - Alerts filter active showing only alert post
06_polls_filter.jpeg - Polls filter active showing only poll post
07_reaction_picker.jpeg - Reaction picker open with emoji options
15_comments_expanded.jpeg - Comments expanded showing existing comments and input

mocked_apis_list: getMockFeed() - returns 5 posts: 1 alert (post-001), 1 poll (post-002), 3 regular posts
Mock alert post: Kids' OMEGA - Battery critical warning with 2 comments
Mock poll post: Dad's OMEGA - Camp location poll with 3 options
Mock comments: Dad's OMEGA and Mom's OMEGA responses
